p: Akila et al. [ 33] mentioned that total antioxidant capability of fresh guava leaves determined by DPPH method was 71.16 % radical scavenging activity. Olatunde et al. [ 44] found that guava leaf powder extract from dechlorophyllized chloroform was the highest antioxidant activity (240.78, 2598.41 μmol TE/g and 2327.42, for DPPH, FRAP and ABTS methods, respectively). Simamora et al. [ 34] mentioned that guava aqueous leaf extract exhibited more effective scavenging activity than fruit extract with IC 50 of 843.84 and 74.77 μg/mL for fruit and leaves aqueous extracts, respectively.
